OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupSimpleOres
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Simple Ores Ores.

OptionChoice.name: enableSimpleOres
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle Simple Ores ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle Simple Ores ores.
Simple Ores ores will be handled by the mod itself.

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Copper is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: smpoCopperFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Simple Ores Copper distributions

OptionNumeric.name: smpoCopperSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Simple Ores Copper distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Tin is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: smpoTinFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Simple Ores Tin distributions

OptionNumeric.name: smpoTinSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Simple Ores Tin distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Mythril is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: smpoMythrilFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Simple Ores Mythril distributions

OptionNumeric.name: smpoMythrilSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Simple Ores Mythril distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Adamantium is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: smpoAdamantiumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Simple Ores Adamantium distributions

OptionNumeric.name: smpoAdamantiumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Simple Ores Adamantium distributions

Choice.Description: Short and sparsely filled compound veins containing one material inside another.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Onyx is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: smpoOnyxFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Simple Ores Onyx distributions

OptionNumeric.name: smpoOnyxSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Simple Ores Onyx distributions

Substitute.name: smpoOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: smpoCopperVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: smpoCopperCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: smpoCopperHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

StandardGen.name: smpoCopperStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
